entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for target. Stand by to proceed with the attack.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Nav location to the target has been located. Proceed with extreme prejudice.
entries.assassinate_success: Good work, pilot. Let's teach them to bring violence to Nova Orion Station.
entries.destroy_escort: The entire squad must be eradicated.
entries.failed_escape: Viado Klivian escaped! How could you let that happen!!
entries.quest_escort_d: Destroy any of Viado Klivian's henchmen that dare to show themselves. Make sure none escapes.
entries.quest_location_d: Destroy Viado Klivian and his henchmen. Let word get out that Nova Orion Industries is not going to be intimidated by their like.
entries.quest_location_t: Ord Mantell System - Nova Orion Sector.
entries.quest_target_d: Viado Klivian's actions helped lead to Katiara Orion's death. Destroy him!
entries.title: Nova Orion: Destroy Viado Klivian and his henchmen
entries.title_d: Viado Klivian was one of the thugs involved in Katiara's death.
